Question: KIOXIA America, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
KIOXIA America, Inc.

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- KIOXIA showcases an extensive portfolio of solid state drives (SSDs) and memory solutions at CES 2024, featuring new technologies, products, and form factors designed to meet upcoming IT requirements and standards, including PCIe 5.0 and UFS 4.0. The diverse lineup of flash storage solutions is poised to meet the performance demands of the dynamic technological landscape. The exhibit room (Zeno 4710) on Level 4 of the Venetian® Meeting Center from January 5-7 will feature the latest innovations in flash memory and SSDs. KIOXIA's BiCS FLASH™ 3D technology continues to shape the future of storage in high-density applications, including advanced smartphones, PCs, SSDs, automotive, and data centers.

For more information, please visit www.kioxia.com.
